name: Cul-de-Sac
description: A quiet, circular street with well-manicured lawns and parked minivans.

name: Strip Mall
description: A row of small shops, a nail salon, and a fast-food place with a nearly full parking lot.

name: Big Box Store
description: A massive retail store with endless aisles and a chaotic parking lot.

name: Soccer Field
description: Kids running around, parents in folding chairs, and a snack bar serving hot dogs.

name: Drive-Thru
description: A popular fast-food chain with a long line of cars waiting for their coffee fix.

name: Elementary School
description: A red brick school with a playground, a flagpole, and a bustling drop-off lane.

name: Suburban Park
description: A small green space with a walking trail, benches, and a duck-filled pond.

name: Gas Station
description: A 24-hour fuel stop with an overpriced convenience store inside.

name: HOA Meeting
description: A beige community center where neighbors argue about mailbox colors.

name: Neighbor’s Backyard
description: A BBQ grill is sizzling, kids are on the trampoline, and someone brought potato salad.
